document.discussion_title: Child suicide bomber kills 51 in Turkey
document.topic_text: A suicide bomber believed to be aged between 12 and 14 has attacked a wedding party in the Turkish city of Gaziantep , killing at least 51 people. »
document.post: A suicide bomber believed to be aged between 12 and 14 has attacked a wedding party in the Turkish city of Gaziantep , killing at least 51 people. »
